Package org.eclipse.mosaic.rti

Class MosaicRtiAmbassador

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.rti.MosaicRtiAmbassador
All Implemented Interfaces:
Interactable, RtiAmbassador
public class MosaicRtiAmbassador extends Object implements RtiAmbassador
Implementation of RtiAmbassador that forwards all requests to responsible service bundle.

  • Method Details

    • requestAdvanceTime

      public void requestAdvanceTime(long time) throws IllegalValueException
      Description copied from interface: RtiAmbassador

      This method should be called by a federate ambassador to request advancing its simulation time. The RTI ambassador forwards this request to the time management and an event representing the request is stored. When the event is scheduled the federate ambassador is called by the RTI.

      This method delivers exactly the same result as requestAdvanceTime(time, 0, 0)

      Specified by:
      requestAdvanceTime in interface RtiAmbassador
      Parameters:
      time - the simulation time in [ns]
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if an invalid time value has been passed

    • requestAdvanceTime

      public void requestAdvanceTime(long time, long lookahead, byte priority) throws IllegalValueException
      Description copied from interface: RtiAmbassador
      This method should be called by a federate ambassador to request advancing its simulation time. The RTI ambassador forwards this request to the time management and an event representing the request is stored. When the event is scheduled the federate ambassador is called by the RTI.
      Specified by:
      requestAdvanceTime in interface RtiAmbassador
      Parameters:
      time - the simulation time in [ns]
      lookahead - the time length in [ns] with which the federate guarantees to not request a time advance again
      priority - the priority of the event
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if an invalid time value has been passed

    • triggerInteraction

      public void triggerInteraction(Interaction interaction) throws IllegalValueException, InternalFederateException
      Description copied from interface: Interactable
      This method allows a caller to interact with other federates by sending an interaction. Responsible to forward the interaction subscribers is the interaction management. After this method is called, the callers last granted time advance request is canceled. Consequently, the caller is not allowed to advance its own time to any time later than the interaction time before a new time advance request is granted.
      Specified by:
      triggerInteraction in interface Interactable
      Parameters:
      interaction - the interaction object to send to the other ambassadors in the federation
      Throws:
      IllegalValueException - if the interaction contains illegal values
      InternalFederateException - if the interaction could not be published by the InteractionManagement
